title: Vanaprastham Emerald and Diamond Stud Earrings
materials: VS Clarity Diamonds (1.46 carats). Hyderabadi Polish for lasting shine.
features: Circular stud design with radiating emerald cabochons, meticulously arranged around a swirling diamond center. The emeralds showcase a smooth, polished finish. The diamonds are set in a pave setting to maximize brilliance. Modern floral-inspired design with traditional South Indian flair.
colors: Vibrant green emeralds complemented by the sparkling white diamonds and warm yellow gold.
occasions: and special occasions. Can also be worn for a half-saree function (Langa Voni function) or other festive events.
description: A captivating blend of traditional gemstone choice with a modern aesthetic. The high-quality emeralds provide a vibrant pop of color, while the diamonds add a touch of luxury. These earrings are comfortable to wear and feature a secure setting, making them ideal for everyday elegance or special events. Emeralds are known for bringing prosperity and luck, making this piece a meaningful addition to your jewelry collection.
